title: Parental Controls: Dictation and Profanity (com.apple.ironwood.support)
description: Parental Controls: Dictation and Profanity settings

Ironwood Allowed.title: Allow use of Siri and Dictation
Ironwood Allowed.description: Set to false to disable dictation.

Profanity Allowed.title: Allow Profanity in Dictation
Profanity Allowed.description: Set to false to suppress profanity.
